TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeSystemExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeSystemExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 为在任务和 Windows 运行时异步操作之间转换提供扩展方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods for converting between tasks and Windows Runtime asynchronous actions and operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展方法重载使你能够使用 .net 对象从 Windows 运行时管理异步操作。 The extension method overloads enable you to use a .NET object to manage an asynchronous operation from the Windows Runtime. 方法和方法使你能够将开始任务传递给采用 Windows 运行时异步操作和操作的方法。The method and the method enable you to pass started tasks to methods that take Windows Runtime asynchronous actions and operations. 另请参见类的方法。See also the methods of the class. 编译器使用这些方法来实现操作 (在 Visual Basic 中)。The methods are used by compilers to implement the operation ( in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction AsAsyncAction (this System.Threading.Tasks.Task source);
.method public static hidebysig class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction AsAsyncAction(class System.Threading.Tasks.Task source) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsAsyncAction (source As Task) As IAsyncAction
static member AsAsyncAction : System.Threading.Tasks.Task -> Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction

span.span: The started task.

summary.span: 返回表示已开始任务的 Windows 运行时异步操作。

span.span: Returns a Windows Runtime asynchronous action that represents a started task.

returns.span: 一个 实例，表示已启动的任务。

span.span: A instance that represents the started task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 和C#中, 你可以在类型为的任何对象上将此方法作为实例方法来调用。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法C# (编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 当要将任务传递给采用异步操作的 Windows 运行时方法时, 请使用此方法。Use this method when you want to pass a task to a Windows Runtime method that takes an asynchronous action. 类提供静态方法 (`Shared` Visual Basic 中的方法), 这些方法创建并启动 Windows 运行时异步操作, 这些操作表示可响应取消请求和报告进度的任务。 The class provides static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic) that create and start Windows Runtime asynchronous actions that represent tasks that can respond to cancellation requests and report progress.

span.span: is .
is an unstarted task.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation<TResult> AsAsyncOperation<TResult> (this System.Threading.Tasks.Task<TResult> source);
.method public static hidebysig class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<!!TResult> AsAsyncOperation<TResult>(class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<!!TResult> source) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsAsyncOperation(Of TResult) (source As Task(Of TResult)) As IAsyncOperation(Of TResult)
static member AsAsyncOperation : System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'Result> -> Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation<'Result>

span.span: The type that returns the result.
The started task.

summary.span: 返回表示返回结果的已开始任务的 Windows 运行时异步操作。

span.span: Returns a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation that represents a started task that returns a result.

returns.span: 一个 实例，表示已启动的任务。

span.span: A instance that represents the started task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 和C#中, 你可以在类型为的任何对象上将此方法作为实例方法来调用。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法C# (编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 当要将返回结果的任务传递给采用异步操作的 Windows 运行时方法时, 请使用此方法。Use this method when you want to pass a task that returns a result to a Windows Runtime method that takes an asynchronous operation. 类提供静态方法 (`Shared` Visual Basic 中的方法), 这些方法创建并启动 Windows 运行时异步操作, 这些操作表示返回结果并可响应取消请求和报告进度的任务。 The class provides static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic) that create and start Windows Runtime asynchronous operations that represent tasks that return results and can respond to cancellation requests and report progress.

span.span: is .
is an unstarted task.

static member AsTask : Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

span.span: The asynchronous action.

summary.span: 返回表示 Windows 运行时异步操作的任务。

span.span: Returns a task that represents a Windows Runtime asynchronous action.

returns.span: 一个表示异步操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 和C#中, 你可以在类型为的任何对象上将此方法作为实例方法来调用。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法C# (编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法可获取 Windows 运行时异步操作的对象。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 对象简化了异步操作的协调。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 和C#中, 你可以在类型为的任何对象上将此方法作为实例方法来调用。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法C# (编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法可获取 Windows 运行时异步操作的对象。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 对象简化了异步操作的协调。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations. 调用此方法重载等效于调用扩展方法重载, 并为参数指定。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the extension method overload and specifying for the parameter. 如果你不想从报告进度的操作获取进度报告, 这会很有用。This is useful when you don't want to get progress reports from an action that reports progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 和C#中, 你可以在类型为的任何对象上将此方法作为实例方法来调用。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法C# (编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法可获取 Windows 运行时异步操作的对象。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 对象简化了异步操作的协调。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 和C#中, 你可以在类型为的任何对象上将此方法作为实例方法来调用。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法C# (编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法可获取 Windows 运行时异步操作的对象。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 对象简化了异步操作的协调。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations. 调用此方法重载等效于调用扩展方法重载, 并为参数指定。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the extension method overload and specifying for the parameter. 如果你不想从报告进度的操作获取进度报告, 这会很有用。This is useful when you don't want to get progress reports from an action that reports progress.

span.span: is .
